titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z233: Ketubah, 1857.

notesStmt.note: Dimensions for the document currently unattainable.

The text is framed by three rectangular panels: the two side panels display large palmette motifs, while the bottom panel contains the initials of the bride and groom. In the document's upper section, two bare-breasted mermaids support a pair of oval cartouches. A pair of blessing hands appears in each upper corner.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE)
